BEER WINE LIQUOR
*changes name to Drizly O'Shaughnessy McMillihan II*
Look, we all know what day is coming up. We also know what you're planning to drink during it: Jameson, Guinness, Baileys or some combination of the three. So if you're interested, here are a few new ways to drink those St. Paddy's Day staples – and some festive things to do while drinking them.   /
SHOP PADDY'S DAY
Drink: Baileys 

Try it in: Baileys Nutty Coffee Irishman (recipe here)

Then pair it with: These coffee doughnuts with Baileys icing and the poetry of W.B. Yeats, which you can listen to wherever you stream your music. In a day known for its debauchery, that's as classy as you can get. 
Drink: Guinness

Try it in: Guinness Half & Half (recipe here)

Then pair it with: These Guinness smoky mac n' cheese egg rolls and the Dublin-set film Once should keep things significantly festive through lunch. 
Drink: Jameson

Try it in: Irish Lemonade (recipe here)

Then pair it with: These Guinness and Baileys cheesecake brownies and maybe some light step dancing because 
Baileys Irish Cream Original
